name: Tuner (simple)
description: Provides four simultaneous tuners using a simple pitch detection method. Works reliably for simple tones (e.g., analogue VCOs). Consumes little CPU. Supports microtuning via Scala/MTS. For complex signals, use 'Tuner (fancy)'.

parameters.name: Channel 1
parameters.description: The input bus for tuner number 1 (0=disabled).
